component.name: VOSK Dictation
component.summary: Dictate with your voice — get text. Offline. Straight into the cursor position.

description.p: 🎤 Hold Alt for 1.2 seconds to start recording. Hold Alt again to stop. Recognized text will be inserted into the active window where the cursor was.
📢 Shows system notifications and plays sounds for: program start, recording start/stop, recognition, and text insertion.
📌 Fully offline, nothing is sent anywhere.
🧠 Uses VOSK (Kaldi), runs standalone via AppImage without installation.
🧩 Features: lightweight model vosk-model-small-ru-0.22, tray icon with "Stop" button, auto-insertion via xdotool, notifications via notify-send and paplay, no built-in punctuation.
🖥️ Compatible with any Linux distro supporting AppImage: Ubuntu, Mint, Debian, Arch, Manjaro, Fedora, openSUSE, Elementary, Pop!_OS.
🔹 First release: AppImage, offline recognition, Alt-based input, notifications & sound, text insertion, tray icon.
